Hello blank fragment
Who are we?

Acornhoek Church of the Nazarene is a Christian
 congregation serving the Acorhoek community 
and encouraging others through a life changing Christian journey.
We seek to serve God by working for justice,peace, respect and 
learning from all the great faith traditions and
desire to be known by the love we have for one another
Our mission

We believe that education coupled with evangelism,compassion,\n working for justice and bearing witness to the\nkindom of God are all essential aspects of the mission to make disciples in the nations.
